# ForceMode.velocity

**Case**

A direct adjustment to a body’s linear or angular velocity, independent of its mass or inertia.

## Declaration

```swift
case velocity
```

## Discussion

The quantity that user sets via [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ForceEffectParameters/setForce(_:index:)] has the units of distance / time. `velocity` mode causes a change in velocity independent of a body’s mass.

The quantity that user sets via [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ForceEffectParameters/setTorque(_:index:)] has the units of 1 / time or radian / time. `velocity` mode causes a change in angular velocity independent of a body’s mass or inertia.
